caption.p: Comparison of Δ(P − ET) projections between the full and the constrained ensembles. Here Δ(P − ET) corresponds to changes between the means of periods 1976–2005 and 2071–2100 and is expressed in millimeters per year. The four rows correspond to the mean (μ), the mean‐to‐standard deviation ratio or signal‐to‐noise ratio (μ/σ), the 5th percentile (PCTL) of the ensemble, and the 95th percentile of the ensemble. P = precipitation; ET = evapotranspiration.
